channel.title: Detection on Lvcudar Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Detection on Lvcudar Blog

item.title: Read Paper 《GA-DAN: Geometry-Aware Domain Adaptation Network for Scene Text Detection and Recognition》
item.description:
URL: http://arxiv.org/abs/1907.09466

TL;DR

整合外观变换和几何变换，实现多模态学习，更好的适应不同视角的目标检测，并在场景文字检测中验证。

item.title: Read Paper 《Omnidirectional Scene Text Detection with Sequential-free Box Discretization 》
item.description:
URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/1906.02371

TL;DR

IJCAI 2019 short paper 全方向场景文本检测
